#  0. Load data

```{r prepareData}

# Load data
data <- readRDS("../../output/step_1/finalData.RDS")
dataMatrix <- readRDS("../../output/step_1/dataMatrix.RDS")
keyInfo <- readRDS("../../output/step_1/keyInfo.RDS")
metaInfo <- readRDS("../../output/step_1/metaInfo.RDS")

# Add 'Age' column
match_table <- 
structure(
  list(id = structure(1:6, 
                      .Label = c("105", "218", "261", "043", "160", "149"), 
                      class = "factor"), 
       age = structure(1:6, 
                       .Label = c("60", "44", "31", "25", "25", "43"), 
                       class = "factor")
  ), 
  .Names = c("SampleID", "age"),
  class = "data.frame", 
  row.names = c(NA, -6L)
)

keyInfo <- merge(keyInfo, match_table, all.x=TRUE)

# Remove redundant data
rm(match_table)

```
